contactCount.description: number of contacts in a connector

type.description: property describing the method of mating to the connector

cycleRating.description: number of plug/unplug cycles a connector is rated to support

pitch.description: distance from the center of one contact on the connector to the center of the next contact

keying.description: property describing whether a connector has an asymmetry to prevent it from being plugged in the wrong direction

numberPins.description: number of pins on the connector
